Building.Name: Outpost
Building.Description: An Outpost building is the humble first step in a civilization's efforts to colonize a new world. Outposts provide for a base level of agricultural, industrial, and scientific capacity. When built on a barren planet, it is critical for an outpost to be supplemented with an aeroponic farm. Outposts are also capable of rudimentary self-defense in case of invasion.
Building.ShortDescription: Provides basic functions necessary for colonies
